description: Improve your French pronunciation with expert guidance. This workshop will focus on common pronunciation challenges and provide practical tips to enhance your speaking skills.

speakers.title: French Language Coach
speakers.about: Sophie has over 10 years of experience in teaching French and specializes in pronunciation and phonetics.

speakers.title: Linguistics Professor
speakers.about: Pierre is a renowned linguistics professor with a focus on phonetics and language acquisition.

description: Join our interactive Spanish conversation hour to practice your speaking skills. This session is ideal for intermediate and advanced learners.

speakers.title: Spanish Language Instructor
speakers.about: Isabella is a certified Spanish instructor and language enthusiast.

description: Deepen your understanding of German grammar with this comprehensive masterclass. Our expert instructors will cover complex grammar topics and provide in-depth explanations.

speakers.title: German Language Expert
speakers.about: Hans is a linguist and language enthusiast, known for his expertise in German grammar.

description: Discover the art of Chinese calligraphy in this hands-on workshop. Learn the basics of stroke order and create your own beautiful characters.

speakers.title: Chinese Calligraphy Master
speakers.about: Li Wei is a renowned Chinese calligraphy artist with a passion for teaching.

description: Experience the rich culture of Japan in this immersive event. Learn about traditional tea ceremonies, kimono dressing, and more.

speakers.title: Japanese Culture Enthusiast
speakers.about: Yuki is a cultural expert and has a deep passion for sharing the beauty of Japan.

description: Get your English language questions answered in this open clinic. Whether it's grammar, vocabulary, or pronunciation, our experts are here to help.

speakers.title: English Language Specialist
speakers.about: John has over 15 years of experience in teaching English and is known for his patient and effective teaching style.

description: Join our intensive Russian language course designed for beginners. Learn the Cyrillic alphabet, basic vocabulary, and essential phrases.

speakers.title: Russian Language Instructor
speakers.about: Elena is a native Russian speaker with a passion for teaching the language to newcomers.

description: Discover the beauty of Arabic calligraphy in this interactive workshop. Learn the art of writing Arabic script with expert guidance.

speakers.title: Arabic Calligraphy Artist
speakers.about: Layla is a talented Arabic calligraphy artist with a passion for preserving this art form.

description: Join our Korean language exchange program to practice speaking with native Korean speakers and fellow learners.

speakers.title: Korean Language Enthusiast

description: Embark on a virtual journey to Portuguese-speaking destinations. Learn about culture, travel tips, and language essentials for your next trip.

speakers.title: Travel Enthusiast
speakers.about: Maria is a seasoned traveler with a deep love for Portuguese-speaking countries.
